tests.title: should return 404 for non-existent routes
tests.fullTitle: API Tests (using global fetch) Error Handling should return 404 for non-existent routes
tests.code:
const res = await fetch(`${BASE_URL}/nonexistent`);
expect(res.status).to.equal(404);
